Vulcan, Blacksmith of the Flame:
Very well! Let me ask you a favor! Bring me 1000 Flames from the monsters inside the Forge of the Gods. I'll give you a Weapon Recipe: Grade S that I have.
Oh, I just remembered that my younger brother, Rooney, also collects Flames in the Forge of the Gods. He's a wanderer, that boy! I've heard that he gives a Weapon Recipe: Grade S to anyone who brings him 1200 Flames, but he probably won't be easy to find!
